Literature.Title: Delineating the Mechanism of Action of a Protease Resistant and Salt Tolerant Synthetic Antimicrobial Peptide against Pseudomonas aeruginosa.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=200 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:-=NA
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC90=50µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC90=>=100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC90=50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC90=>=100µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC90=50µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi TY2(MIC90=15µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC90=50µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC90=50µM),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC90=25µM),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC90=50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 2488(MIC=30µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae MTCC 443(MIC=50µM),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 96(MIC=80µM)
